select c.id, c.dname, c.dcode, c.create_time, c.is_enabled, c.salesman, c.organization , o.dname organization_name, u.username salesman_name from bs_customer c left join bs_organization o on o.id = c.organization left join bs_user u on u.id = c.salesman

and c.dcode = #{customerDTO.dcode}
order by c.id desc
